    Visualize Word Cloud of Titles or Subjects

    Source: R/visualizeFinna.R
    visualize_word_cloud.Rd

    Creates a word cloud showing the frequency of words in titles or subjects.

    Usage

    visualize_word_cloud(metadata, column = "Title")

    Arguments

    metadata

    A tibble containing refined Finna metadata, with "Title" or "Subjects" column.

    column

    The column to visualize as a word cloud (e.g., "Title" or "Subjects").

    Value

    A word cloud plot of the most frequent words.

    Examples

    library(finna)
music_data <- search_finna("music")
refined_data <- refine_metadata(music_data)
visualize_word_cloud(refined_data, "Title")
